name: Graveyard Gardener
description:
//  STILL IN DEVELOPMENT //

You play as a gardener working in a graveyard. Push around entire rows of gravestones and grass tiles to rearrange the landscape for your undead employers. Be careful though, as taking too many moves will restart the level!

When you move, you push the entire row along with you, making blocks move forward or cycle around behind. Use this to your advantage to push blocks to the other side of the grid, split groups of blocks apart or even teleport yourself to the other side of the map! 

Arrow keys to move, R to restart a level. Have fun!
